decoworld.model.world.combat

Interface HasExperience

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasLevel, HasStats, StatListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player

    public interface HasExperience
extends HasLevel, HasStats
    Experience is presented as a positive value (double). Can only be increased, but will reset to 0 when level up; maximum value increases at the same time. Experience will cap at level 25, starts increasing again once second class is achieved. Experience will max out at level 99.
